Title: Captain Johnny
Plot: A wager is made between Rachel and the boys as to whose case will garner better PR for the firm -- Jared and Peter?s defense of a fisherman in which they invoke "Pirate Law" or Rachel?s case, a wrongful termination involving a self-proclaimed psychic. Meanwhile, Peter and Jared acquire a "discarded" curbside sofa, which Pindar discovers is a certain celebrity. This renews a feud between the star and their landlord, Stanton.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Fernanda Andrade, Eric Balfour, Matt Battaglia, John Ratzenberger, Dale Waddington, Caitlin Muelder, Dariush Kashani, Roy Abramsohn, Jean St. James, Tim Trobec, Damion Poitier, Catherine Kresge, Ross Mackenzie
